mapper.select: SELECT 'everyone' ROLE_ID, '모두' ROLE_NAME, NULL UPD_ID, NULL UPD_TIME UNION SELECT 'authenticated' ROLE_ID, '로그인 사용자' ROLE_NAME, NULL UPD_ID, NULL UPD_TIME UNION SELECT ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME FROM TBL_ROLE ORDER BY ROLE_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ROLE ( ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, DESCRP, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{modifiedBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ROLE SET ROLE_NAME = #{name}, DESCRP = #{description}, UPD_ID = #{modifiedBy}, UPD_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ROLE_ID = #{id}
mapper.delete:
